title: Working Through a Miscommunication
itunes:author: Guests: Dr. David and Sandy Clarke
itunes:summary:
Every wife wants a listening husband. By listening, he shows her how much he cares about her heart. Greg talks with John about how he's learned to listen to his wife Erin. Featuring Dr. David and Sandy Clarke.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY
